text: Las Plassas (Is Pràtzas) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 240 people lived there. Its area is 11.04 km². It is 148 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Las Plassas
